title: Parents only slaughtered one sheep for my Aqeeqah, can I do one now
transcript: [Music] so my question is about akika i noticed that a lot of people don't they don't know that when they give it to a boy that they are meant to slaughter two sheep so most of the people started one ship so my question is when the boy grow up and find out that um they start a worship for him should he start a one more sheep okay i will answer inshallah tifa he says that a child grew up finding out that his parents slaughtered only one sheep and she knows that a male the sunnah is to slaughter two sheep so is it permissible to slaughter one sheep now that's there is no problem in that at all you
